item.title: Building High-Performance Application with FastAPI Redis Celery Flower Docker
item.description: Introduction In the world of modern web applications, speed and scalability are critical. Sometimes, tasks like sending emails, processing reports, or running machine learning models need to be offloaded from the main API to avoid slowing down user interactions. This is where the FastAPI + Redis + Celery + Flower stack comes inâ€”a powerful setup that enables asynchronous processing and real-time monitoring of background tasks. This article will walk you through how these technologies work together and provide a guide for building your own high-performance backend using this stack.
